metadataAttributes.Title: Future Development in Supply Chain Finance and Blockchain Technology
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course focuses on future developments in Supply Chain Finance such as Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Application Programming Interfaces (APIs). This course covers the basic concepts of Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT), the key features as well as the benefits the solution represents for Supply Chain Finance.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Financial Innovation,Blockchain Implementation in Supply Chain Finance,APIs for Trade Finance,Managing Accounts Receivable and Accounts Payable with Blockchain,
